fr.zimzim.sound

Enum SoundEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SoundEngine>
      • fr.zimzim.sound.SoundEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SoundEngine>

    public enum SoundEngine
extends java.lang.Enum<SoundEngine>
    The enum is used to play a sound related to a game specific event
    Author:
    Simon Jambu
